snippet: HUNT--Walter A.,Jr. The Center for Architecture mourns the passing of our devoted patron, leader and friend. His vision and generosity will leave a lasting legacy. Our sympathies to his wife Judy and his entire family. 1/3
lead_paragraph: HUNT--Walter A.,Jr. The Center for Architecture mourns the passing of our devoted patron, leader and friend. His vision and generosity will leave a lasting legacy. Our sympathies to his wife Judy and his entire family. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HUNT, WALTER A.
